header_section.title: Transaction Paypal 24 hours
header_section.description: The largest Bitcoin trading platform in Indonesia since 2015. Easy, anytime & anywhere 24 hours without holidays. Triv is integrated with 61 banks & E-money in Indonesia, since 2015 Triv is used by millions of people to transact Paypal.

liquiditas.title: High Liquidity
liquiditas.content: Spread or the difference in the buying and selling price of Bitcoin Triv is one of the lowest in the market today. With our brokerage system you do not need to wait for other buyers / sellers to make transactions. All buying / selling transactions can be done instantly and in real-time without a waiting process.
liquiditas.content_3: in the market today. With our brokerage system you don't have to wait for other buyers/sellers to make transactions. All buy/sell transactions can be done instantly and in real-time without waiting.

regulator.title: Regulated and Trusted Broker
regulator.content: Since 2015 Triv has been used by millions of people, all customer funds in our system are insured by Bitgo and Lloyd England for 100 million USD or equivalent to 1.45 trillion rupiah.Triv is an official broker registered and supervised by Bappebti.

layanan_section.title: What You can do with Paypal in Triv
layanan_section.title_1: What You Can Do With Triv
layanan_section.content: Triv supports various types of transactions and not just paypal buying and selling. Swap, exchange or top up Paypal balance can be done in one application.

jual_beli.title: Buy and Sell Paypal Balance 24 hours
jual_beli.content: Unlike traditional investment instruments, Triv Exchange has no holidays. You can buy your Paypal balance in real-time with banks or e-wallets in seconds even on holidays.

kirim.title: Instant overseas transfer
kirim.content: You can use your Paypal balance to send money to all Paypal users in the world for free and instantly. Unlike traditional remittances that require 1-2 business days. Digital USD delivery takes place instantly in seconds.

terima.title: Shopping on International Sites
terima.content: Paypal is accepted by millions of international merchants, so you can shop online without needing a credit card. Simply top up your Paypal balance in Triv, and you can access international markets and shop in minutes.

hoddl.title: USD Digital Wallet
hoddl.content: In addition to being used for shopping, the Paypal Balance can be used as a digital wallet with USD currency. As an alternative for you to invest USD without hassle and in seconds at Triv.

swap.title: Swap Paypal
swap.content: Triv supports over 700+ digital assets on our platform and growing. Need more assets? Swap to a wide range of other digital assets in real-time 24/7 on Triv with your Paypal!

isi_pulsa.title: Get Cash back & Protection
isi_pulsa.content: Shop at various international sites and get cashback with your Paypal Balance. In addition to getting cashback, Paypal will protect your online shopping with insurance. So that all your Paypal transactions will be safe and free from fraud.

live_chat.title: Average LiveChat Responds
live_chat.content: Livechat and Call center support services at Triv, ready to assist you 24/7

processing.title: Average Processing Time
processing.content: Automatic and downtime-free transactions at Triv. Since 2015, Triv has been operating without downtime

ewallet_section.title: Triv Supports 100 banks & E-wallets in Indonesia for all our transactions
ewallet_section.title_3: in Indonesia for all our transactions
ewallet_section.subtitle: 24/7 Real Time Deposit & Withdrawal
ewallet_section.description: All Triv rupiah deposits and withdrawals are processed instantly within minutes to various banks and e-wallets. Need funds in the middle of the night? Done! No need to wait until the next day.Unlike the stock and mutual fund markets, digital assets do not have holidays, all deposit and withdrawal transactions are processed 24 hours including on holidays.
ewallet_section.description_1: All Triv rupiah deposits and withdrawals are processed instantly within minutes to various banks and e-wallets.
ewallet_section.description_2: Need funds in the middle of the night? Done! No need to wait until the next day.Unlike the stock and mutual fund markets, digital assets do not have holidays, all deposit and withdrawal transactions are processed 24 hours including on holidays.

triv_affliate.content_1: With our Affiliate program every time your downline makes a transaction, you will get 10% cashback unconditionally!
triv_affliate.content_2: Triv Affiliates have no expiration date and are valid for life, as long as your downline makes transactions, you will continue to earn commissions without time limit.
triv_affliate.follow_text: Invite friends and earn extra income
